chapter_1.verse_1: The Tao that can be told is not the eternal Tao...
chapter_1.verse_2: The name that can be named is not the eternal name...

chapter_2.verse_1: When people see some things as beautiful, other things become ugly...

interpretation.verse_1: Emphasizes the ineffable nature of truth and wisdom.
interpretation.verse_2: Contrasts duality in existence and perception.
